expo.name: FoodLocker
expo.description: Foodlocker's Consumer Mobile Application.  Allows users to purchase meals at different Foodlocker locations.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allows users to upload pictures of themselves taken with their phone for their profile picture.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app does not require access to the microphone.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allows users to take a profile picture of themselves which will be uploaded to the Firebase database.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Allows the user to login to the application using biometrics
